description: Ensures each HTML document contains a non-empty <title> element

nodes.html: <html class="modern js canvas canvastext no-touch history rgba textshadow csstransforms csstransforms3d csstransitions video audio applicationcache svg inlinesvg smil svgclippaths mediaqueries no-jsautomargins displaytable widthboundsontables absolutepositionontables nav-ready bp-nav-desktop bp-footer-desktop" dir="ltr" style="" lang="en">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

any.message: Document does not have a non-empty <title> element

help: Documents must have <title> element to aid in navigation

description: Ensures every id attribute value is unique

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has multiple elements with the same id attribute: page-wrap-inner

any.message: Document has multiple elements with the same id attribute: page-wrap-inner

help: id attribute value must be unique

description: Ensures elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element does not have an alt attribute
  aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
  aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty or not visible
  Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation"
  Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none"

any.message: Element does not have an alt attribute
aria-label attribute does not exist or is empty
aria-labelledby attribute does not exist, references elements that do not exist or references elements that are empty or not visible
Element has no title attribute or the title attribute is empty
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="presentation"
Element's default semantics were not overridden with role="none"
